issue.title: MD edit form : add and remove fields and fieldsets in ajax doen't work since #895 (organism manager)
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

MD edit form : add and remove fields and fieldsets in ajax doen't work since #895 (organism manager):

* If user is organism manager and resource manager : the form is locked but he can remove and add (one) field or fieldset
* If user in metadataresponsible or metadataeditor, he cannot add more than one field in ajax, or remove fields
** This problems comes from the rights checks that are not available in ajax 

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2
